rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
special_text:
I – Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
II – Create a 2/2 white Cat creature token.
III – Create a 3/3 red Ox creature token.
IV – Creatures you control gain vigilance and indestructible until end of turn.
